title: Who is Igor Lemeshkin?
lead: Product designer. Works at the intersection of design, code, and strategy.
Curiosity-led. Detail-obsessed. Fuels deep focus with side quests, music, and perfectly brewed coffee.

sections.title: Igor designs.
lines: He creates sharp interfaces, streamlined systems, and intuitive interactions — always grounded in real workflows, not trends.
He breaks down complexity, aligns tightly with development, and builds scalable solutions that last.

checklist.title: Seamless handoffs
checklist.description: Zero friction from concept to code

sections.title: It Doesn't End There.
lines: Igor not only designs stuff. He can also build a product, like the one you're looking at.
To him, it's all design. Other labels don't mean much. As automation spreads, he is staying ahead, thinking across disciplines and making the right calls.
His power is in sharp decisions, rooted in rich multidisciplinary experience. That's exactly what tomorrow demands.

facts.title: Invented a Design Pattern
facts.text: At iMusician, Igor pioneered the “everything is a field” system — reducing clutter, scaling fast, and making users and devs actually happy.

facts.title: Designed for Scale, Not Screenshots
facts.text: His design system works across 5 products with different tech stacks — and still feels like one

facts.title: Speaks Dev Language
facts.text: Igor collaborates deep with devs. Zero handoff drama.

facts.title: Business-Savvy
facts.text: He knows how product decisions affect the bottom line — and designs accordingly.

facts.title: Prototyped. Validated. Shipped.
facts.text: Rapid prototyping wasn't a phase — it happens weekly. Igor made fast feedback loops the norm.

facts.title: Full-Stack Thinker
facts.text: From high-level flows to front-end code, Igor doesnt stop at UI — he designs how the product works.

sections.title: Guess & Learn
lines: Igor didn't follow a straight path. Explore the moments that defined his journey — one guess at a time.

sections.title: Side Skills & Achievements
lines: Igor is always chasing new hobbies. But no matter where he wanders, he always circles back to his first love: design.
And yes, every side quest adds a little something extra to the way he does it.

cards.label: Loyal worker
cards.description: Great design takes commitment. 7 years at iMusican was a great ride

cards.label: Pocket barista
cards.description: I craft coffee like I design — patiently, precisely, and with flow.

cards.label: Roadtrip UX Analyst
cards.description: Every long drive is a usability test for cities, roads, and interfaces.

cards.label: Music designer
cards.description: I shape sound like I shape design — structured, intentional, and rhythmic.
